Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 * FROM w2_SeoMetadatas WHERE data_kbn = 'default_setting') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_SeoMetadatas] ([shop_id], [data_kbn], [html_title], [metadata_keywords], [metadata_desc], [comment], [del_flg], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed]) VALUES (N'0', N'default_setting', N'@@ html_title @@', N'', N'', N'', N'0', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), N'CMS初期設定') END GO
